MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL32 postcode area of Conwy, affecting properties in Meirion Drive, Stephenson Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:58PM. Our engineers are continuing to investigate the cause of the fault and we are awaiting delivery of generators to restore power. We now expect power to be restored by 2AM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:15pm on 2nd November 2020
